Point

A simple point.

Summary
Functions
PointIf a is a Point, creates a copy of it.

Functions

Point

window.Point = function(a,
y)

If a is a Point, creates a copy of it.  Otherwise, expects a to be x, and creates a Point with it along with y.  If either a or y are omitted, 0 is used in their place.

Rect

A simple rectangle.

Summary
Functions
RectIf a is a Rect, creates a copy of it.

Functions

Rect

window.Rect = function(a,
top,
width,
height)

If a is a Rect, creates a copy of it.  Otherwise, expects a to be left, and creates a Rect with it along with top, width, and height.

Subscribable

A mix-in for allowing objects to collect subscribers for custom events.  Currently supports only onClose.  TODO generalize for any number of events

Summary
Functions
addSubscriberThe given callback will be called when the Subscribable fires the given event.
removeSubscriberRemoves the callback associated with refObject for the given event.
_sendToSubscribersInternal routine.
addOnCloseThe given callback will be called when the Subscribable fires its onClose.
removeOnCloseRemoves the callback associated with referenceElement for onClose notification.
_sendOnCloseInternal routine.

Functions

addSubscriber

addSubscriber: function(refObject,
eventName,
callback)

The given callback will be called when the Subscribable fires the given event.  The refObject is used to facilitate removal if necessary.

removeSubscriber

removeSubscriber: function(refObject,
eventName)

Removes the callback associated with refObject for the given event.

_sendToSubscribers

_sendToSubscribers: function(eventName,
eventInfo)

Internal routine.  Used by the Subscribable to fire events.

addOnClose

addOnClose: function(referenceElement,
callback)

The given callback will be called when the Subscribable fires its onClose.  The referenceElement is used to facilitate removal if necessary.

removeOnClose

removeOnClose: function(referenceElement)

Removes the callback associated with referenceElement for onClose notification.

_sendOnClose

_sendOnClose: function()

Internal routine.  Used by the Subscribable to fire onClose events.
